48-year-old female.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis that have been refractory to outpatient medical management.

chronic sinusitis.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis that have been refractory to outpatient medical management.

nasal polyposis.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis that have been refractory to outpatient medical management.

Functional endoscopic sinus surgery.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

bilateral maxillary antrostomy.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

bilateral total ethmoidectomy.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

bilateral nasal polypectomy.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

right middle turbinate reduction.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

cotton pledgets saturated with 4 cc of 1.context: The patient was rotated 90 degrees away where cotton pledgets saturated with 4 cc of 10% cocaine solution were inserted into the nasal cavity.

1% lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: The nasal septum, as well as the turbinates were then localized with a mixture of 1% lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine solution.

gross polypoid disease.context: The initial examination revealed a gross polypoid disease emanating from the sphenoid sinuses as well as off the supreme turbinate.

patent eustachian tube.context: Nasopharynx was visualized with a patent eustachian tube.

thick and polypoid tissue.context: It should be mentioned that tissue was very thick and polypoid with chronic inflammatory changes evident.

chronic inflammatory changes.context: It should be mentioned that tissue was very thick and polypoid with chronic inflammatory changes evident.

grossly hypertrophied turbinate.context: Inspection revealed a grossly hypertrophied turbinate.

Merocel packing.context: Once all bleeding has been controlled, all surgical instruments were removed and Merocel packing was placed in the bilateral nasal cavities with the intent to remove in the recovery room.
